Simphiwe Ndzube (amụrụ n'afọ 1990 na Hofmeyr, Eastern Cape, South Africa) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nà South Africa nké sitere nà Xhosa na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Los Angeles, California na Cape Town, South Africa
Ọ natara BFA ya na Michaelis School of Fine Arts nà Mahadum Cape Town n'afọ 2015.

E mèrè ihe ngosi nka mbụ nkè Ndzube na United States "Oracles of the Pink Universe" na Denver Art Museum site n'ubochí irí na àtó n'ọnwa Juun, n'afọ 2021 rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2021 ma gosipụta ọtụtụ ihe osise nke na-azaghachi onye na-ese ihe Dutch / Netherlands Hieronymous Bosch's The Garden of Earthly Delights (afọ 1490 rụọ afọ 1510) ma na-emeso ndụ na Post-apartheid South Africa. Ndzube tolitere n'obodo Masiphumelele nke South Africa, aha ya sitere na okwu Xhosa nke pụtara "ka anyị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma"

A kọwaala ọrụ Ndzube ma onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya ma ndị ọzọ dị ka ndị nọ n'ọdịnala nke "ihe dị adị nke anwansi". Ụlọ ngosi Nicodim dị na New York City na Los Angeles na ụlọ ngosi Stevenson dị na South Africa na-anọchite anya ya.
